devops.name: DevOps
devops.description: It is a software development method that emphasizes collaboration, communication, and automation between development and operations teams to improve the speed and reliability of software delivery

linux.name: Linux
linux.description: It is a free and open-source operating system based on Unix, commonly used for servers, supercomputers, and mobile devices

security.name: Security
security.description: It is the practice of protecting sensitive information from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, disruption, modification, or destruction

fullstack.name: Full Stack
fullstack.description: It it refers to the development of both the front-end and back-end of a website or application, including the server, client, and database

network.name: Network
network.description: It is the practice of connecting computers, devices, and other equipment to facilitate communication and information sharing

architecture.name: Architecture
architecture.description: It is the fundamental organization of a software system, comprising of components, their relationships, and principles guiding its design and evolution
